name: Mike
line: Something is coming. Something hungry for blood. A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness. It is almost here.

name: Unknown
line: What is it?

name: Unknown
line: What if it's the Demogorgon?

name: Unknown
line: Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.

name: Unknown
line: It's not the Demogorgon.

name: Mike
line: An army of troglodytes charge into the chamber!

name: Unknown
line: Troglodytes?

name: Unknown
line: Told ya.

name: Mike
line: Wait a minute. Did you hear that? That... that sound? Boom... boom... Boom! That didn't come from the troglodytes. No, that... That came from something else. The Demogorgon!

name: Unknown
line: We're in deep shit.

name: Unknown
line: Will, your action!

name: Will
line: I don't know!

name: Unknown
line: Fireball him!

name: Will
line: I'd have to roll a 13 or higher!

name: Unknown
line: Too risky. Cast a protection spell.

name: Unknown
line: Don't be a pussy. Fireball him!

name: Unknown
line: Cast Protection.

name: Mike
line: The Demogorgon is tired of your silly human bickering! It stomps towards you. Boom! Another stomp, boom! He roars in anger!

name: Unknown
line: Fireball!

line: You've been playing for ten hours?

name: Mike

line: I think you should listen to your mother.

name: Joyce
line: And that's it for News Center this morning. Thanks for joining us. Let's hand off now to Liz at the news desk.

name: Liz
line: All right, thank you, Donna. Turning now to local news, we're getting reports of surges and power outages all across the county. Last night, hundreds of homes in East Hawkins were affected, leaving many residents in the dark. The cause of the outage is still unknown. We reached out to Roane County Water and Electric, and a spokesperson says that they are confident power will be restored to all remaining homes within the next several hours.

line: Look, he's not like you, Hopper. He's not like me. He's not like... most. He has a couple of friends, but, you know, the kids, they're mean. They make fun of him. They call him names. They laugh at him, his clothes...

name: Joyce

line: Joyce, this is Hawkins, okay? You wanna know the worst thing that's ever happened here in the four years I've been working here? Do you wanna know the worst thing? It was when an owl attacked Eleanor Gillespie's head because it thought that her hair was a nest.

line: Okay, fine. I will call Lonnie. He will talk to me before he talks to... What, a pig? A cop! Just find my son, Hop. Find him!

line: What'd I tell you? Ninja.

name: Ben
line: You like that ice cream, huh? Smile looks good on you. You know, smile?

name: Ben
line: All right. You just sit tight. Whoever it is, I'll tell 'em to go away real quick, all right?

name: Ben
line: Hey, can I help you?

name: Connie
line: Hi, you must be Benny Hammond.

name: Ben
line: I'm afraid I am. I'm afraid we're closed for the evening, too. So try back tomorrow morning.

name: Connie
line: Connie Frazier. Social Services.

name: Ben
line: Ah, Social Services. My apologies. I didn't expect you so soon. That's a heck of a drive.

name: Connie
line: Not too bad this time of night.

name: Ben
line: Hey, listen, I... I haven't told her that you're coming yet. I didn't want her running off again. She's a tad skittish.

name: Connie
line: Children I work with usually are.

name: Ben
line: Right, right. So, where is she? Right. She's in the kitchen. Come on up. I'll introduce you.

name: Connie
line: Thank you.

name: Ben
line: Sorry again for trying to turn you away there.

name: Connie
line: It's fine.

name: Ben
line: You know, it's funny. Your, uh, voice sounds different on the...

name: Lucas
line: Ah, man. This is it.

name: Mike
line: Hey, guys. You feel that?

name: Dustin
line: I think maybe we should go back.

name: Mike
line: No. We're not going back. Just stay close. Come on. Just stay on channel six. Don't do anything stupid.

name: Dustin
line: Hey, guys, wait up. Wait up!

name: Steve
line: Which polymers occur naturally?

name: Nancy
line: Starch and cellulose.

name: Steve
line: Mmm.

name: Steve
line: In a molecule of CH4, the hydrogen atoms are spatially oriented towards the centers of...

name: Nancy
line: Tetrahedrons.

name: Steve
line: Wow. Jesus, how many of these did you make?

name: Nancy
line: You said you wanted to help.

name: Steve
line: How about this? How about... How about every time that you get something right, I have to take off an item of clothing. But every time that you get something wrong...

name: Nancy
line: Uh, pass.

name: Steve
line: Oh, come on. Come on. Come on. It'll be fun.

name: Nancy
line: No. No.

name: Steve
line: During fractional distillation, hydrocarbons are separated according to their...

name: Nancy
line: Melting point.

name: Steve
line: Ooh, it's boiling points.

name: Nancy
line: That's what I meant.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, that's not what you said.

name: Nancy
line: No.

name: Steve
line: No? Oh, do you need... Do you need help, or...

name: Nancy
line: No.

name: Nancy
line: Steve. Steve, come on.

name: Steve
line: What?

name: Nancy
line: Are you crazy? My parents are here.

name: Steve
line: That's weird, I... don't see them.

name: Nancy
line: Was this your plan all along? To... to get in my room and then... get another notch on your belt.

name: Steve
line: No. Nancy, no.

name: Nancy
line: I'm not Laurie, or Amy, or Becky.

name: Steve
line: You mean, you're not a slut.

name: Nancy
line: That's not what I'm saying.

name: Steve
line: You know, you're so cute when you lie.

name: Nancy
line: Shut up.

name: Steve
line: Bad Steve. Bad. Don't do that to Miss Nancy...

name: Nancy
line: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.

name: Steve
line: You are beautiful, Nancy Wheeler.

name: Steve
line: Compared to the rate of inorganic reactions, the rate of organic reactions is generally...

name: Joyce
line: Jonathan, wow. You took these? These are great. Wow, they really are.

name: Joyce
line: I know I haven't been there for you. I've been... working so hard and I... I just feel bad. I don't even... barely know what's going on with you. All right? I am sorry about that.

name: Joyce
line: Hey, what is it? What is it, honey?

name: Jonathan
line: Nothing. Tell me. Tell me.

name: Joyce
line: Come on. You can...

name: Jonathan
line: No. It's just... I should've been there for him.

name: Joyce
line: No. Oh, no. You can't do that to yourself. This was not your fault. Do you hear me? He is... close. I know it. I feel it in my heart. You just have to... You have to trust me on this, okay?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, look at this. Look at this one. Look at this one. I mean, that's it, right?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah.

name: Joyce
line: That's it. That's the one.

name: Joyce
line: Hello? Hello? Lonnie? Dad? Hopper? Who is this?

name: Joyce
line: Will? Will? Who is this? What have you done to my boy? Give me back my son!

name: Jonathan
line: Hello? Hello, who is this? Hello? Who is this?

name: Joyce
line: It was him.

name: Jonathan
line: Mom, who was it? Who was it, Mom? Look at me, Mom. Was it Will?

name: Joyce
line: Yes.

name: Jonathan
line: What did he say?

name: Joyce
line: He just breathed. He just breathed.

name: Jonathan
line: And was someone else there?

name: Joyce
line: I... It was him. I know it was his breathing. I know it was his breathing.

name: Mike
line: Will! Will!

name: Lucas
line: Byers!

name: Dustin
line: I've got your X-Men 134!

name: Dustin
line: Guys, I really think we should turn back.

name: Lucas
line: Seriously, Dustin? You wanna be a baby, then go home already!

name: Dustin
line: I'm just being realistic, Lucas!

name: Lucas
line: No, you're just being a big sissy!

name: Dustin
line: Did you ever think Will went missing because he ran into something bad? And we're going to the exact same spot where he was last seen? And we have no weapons or anything?

name: Mike
line: Dustin, shut up.

name: Dustin
line: I'm just saying, does that seem smart to you?

name: Mike
line: Shut up. Shut up.

name: Mike
line: Did you guys hear that?
